_header: He that is of God delighteth ay to hear sermonification

BLHar1197.First Lines: he that is of god delytyt ay to here sermenysacyonof god and in hym to put all his affyans…
BLHar1197.Last Lines: …In all owyr distres & wooful perturbansmost assuyrryd frend stedfast & feytfull
BLHar1197.Note: Added to a blank leaf at end of Lavynham’s Litel Treatise.
